name: Boris the Average
description:
An ordinary day of Boris the plumber who forgot his toolbox at home, but obviously it didn't prevent him from doing his job! Well, almost didn't.

Use Boris hands to block the leaks with common objects before the water level reach the wires.

Controls: 

Hold left click : repair leak with left hand

Hold right click : repair leak with righthand

Boris the Average was developed in 48h for the 2020 Global Game Jam with Unity by a team of three people:

Alexey Pushilin

Andres Diez

Ivan Dmitriev
